group_1.textRight: Whaddaya mean, a draw?![chara:302801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302801:motion_200][chara:302801:cheek_0][chara:302801:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:302801:lipSynch_1] Lemme wrestle@her again, Kako!

group_1.textLeft: Absolutely not! If you wrestle any more,[chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301101:cheek_0][chara:301101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:301101:lipSynch_1]@this poor table will fall apart...

The next game will be...[chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301101:cheek_0][chara:301101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301101:lipSynch_1]something that@won't [chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301101:motion_1][chara:301101:lipSynch_1]break anything!
Ah! We're in a park, so...why don't you@have a bug catching battle?

group_1.textRight: Huh?! Can you even call something like@that a battle?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... Let's see... Umm...
Well, you have to outwit your opponent@by better predicting how the bugs move!
It's just like with a Witch, right? They're@both unpredictable!

group_1.textRight: Whoa, you're right...  That makes sense.

group_1.textLeft: (Thank goodness, they bought it...)
Hee hee hee... [chara:302801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.6][chara:302801:cheek_0][chara:302801:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302801:lipSynch_1]Somethin' the matter,@Felicia?

group_1.textRight: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]N-no! There ain't NOTHIN' in the world@I can't do!

group_1.textLeft: Hee heeee... You can already mark this as@a win for me!
I'm totally super awesome at catchin'@bugs and fish!
Yaaaaaah! I'm gonna catch 'em all!

group_1.textCenter: Whoa, this park's crawlin' with bugs!@Think I'll start with a beetle!
If I climb this tree here, I can get lots...@*Swish* *Rustle*
Hee hee, gotcha, gotcha, gotcha!@On to the next tree!

group_1.textLeft: Hmm? Felicia hasn't moved from under@that tree...
(Is it that hard for her to catch one itty,@bitty bug? Haha!)
...? What's she doin'?
Okay, time's up! Come back! Don't forget@to bring the bugs you caught!
Oh, and by the way...
Don't step too close. I'm not...very good@with bugs...

group_1.textRight: Look, you two! I got 6 rhino beetles!
Four stag beetles, too! Eight ants!@And 2 hairy caterpillars!
I got 20 bugs! How'd ya like THAT,@Felicia?! Count 'em, Kako!

group_1.textLeft: Eeeyaaaaaagh!
[chara:301101:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Ahem... O-okay, Felicia, h-how many did@you catch?
Uwaaaaah! Your bag's overflowing with@caterpillars...
Amazing...[chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.7][chara:301101:motion_400][chara:301101:cheek_0][chara:301101:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:301101:lipSynch_1][chara:301101:mouthOpen_1]and horrible!
[chara:302801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]B-but how?!
How'd ya get so many?! I bet you cheated!
I saw you just standin' by one tree the@whole time!

group_1.textRight: FINE! I'll tell ya the secret!
You go under the tree, like this, yeah?@Then you make a fist...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, grooooooss! It's raining caterpillars!
Eeeeeeeeek!!! THEY'RE IN MY HAIR!
Get them out! Get them ooout!

group_1.textRight: Nooo! My bug cage! It popped open when@it fell!

group_1.textLeft: Your bugs got all mixed up with the ones@that just came out of the tree!
Felicia, how many did ya catch?
Geeze... Wanna try again?
Whaddaya say, Kako?

group_1.textRight: [chara:301101:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]No. No way, and no how! NO!!!
